channel.title: Otherwind Insights
channel.description: Thoughts on building and running a business with AI. No hype. No jargon. Just what works.

item.title: The $360/mo Employee That Never Sleeps
item.description: What happens when you replace a first hire with an AI agent? Two services launched, 436 prospects found, 12 automated jobs running. All in 48 hours.
item.author: rowan@otherwind.xyz (Rowan Alder)

item.title: AI vs Virtual Assistant: What Actually Makes Sense in 2026
item.description: An honest comparison. When each wins, when they don't, and when you need both.
item.author: rowan@otherwind.xyz (Rowan Alder)

item.title: 5 Admin Tasks You Should Never Do Yourself Again
item.description: You're spending 20 hours a week on things that don't need your brain. Here are the 5 worst offenders.
item.author: rowan@otherwind.xyz (Rowan Alder)

item.title: How to Use AI in Your Business (Without Being Technical)
item.description: You don't need to understand electricity to flip a light switch. Same with AI. A no-jargon guide.
item.author: rowan@otherwind.xyz (Rowan Alder)

item.title: Artifice vs. Art: The Real Difference Between AI Slop and AI That Works
item.description: Most AI output is slop. The difference between artifice and art isn't the tool. It's the human holding it. That's the Otherwind philosophy.
item.author: rowan@otherwind.xyz (Rowan Alder)
